Package.Name: CSV
Package.Description: This plugin package contains a result listener that allows for results to be output in a CSV format. CSV is a common data exchange format that is widely supported by consumer, business, and scientific applications. It is basically plain text saved in a tabular format and the settings let you configure which separator to use: comma, semicolon or tabular. ReleasedKeysight Technologies

Plugin.Name: CSV
Plugin.Description: Save results to one or more CSV files. Allows splitting the file(s) based on a maximum file size.

Plugin.BaseType: External Parameter Import | External Parameter Export
Plugin.Name: Comma Separated Values

Plugin.BaseType: External Parameter Export | Sweep Value Import
Plugin.Name: Comma Separated Values
